channel.title: Rz Server. 377/562. SOF. Need mods
channel.description:
[center][size=12pt][font=arial]Rz is a new 377/562. Rz needs a couple of mods that are regularly online.
Features. Working MoneyPouch. dupe in the MoneyPouch. [Server] Announcement when you get 99. LevelPoints with a Store Lottery, [Lottie]. Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim. Smithing (x5, x10). 120 Dungeoneering. Server AutoSave. Player Titles. Auto-Server Save. SOF InterFace. KillStreak Point System. Made KS give you extra PK Points. Dicing. Comp Cape requiring all 99s. Zoom in and Zoom out feature. New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank. Duel Arena. New ::Help method. Everlasting Prayer. Vote point shop Rare shop. 2b Ticket Exchange. New member rank. (1,000 NPC Kills.) Nice Player titles With a good Interface. Player Titles for most ranks. Summoning Working. Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not. Awesome Donator Benefits.
Boss titles. [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/k1dyq1.png[/img]
Changing GameFrame and Pking skill. [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/25f56zd.png[/img]
Working squeal of fortune. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/10fnmon.png[/img]
Lottery and Comp Cape. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/dvkqhv.png[/img]
Perfect skilling in one place. [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29nw3yb.png[/img]
Please join us on Rz.
[url=http://rzserver.netai.net/Play.php]http://rzserver.netai.net/Play.php[/url][/font][/size][/center]

item.title: Rz Server. 377/562. SOF. Need mods
item.dc:creator: @Zeaonrs Zeaonrs
item.description:
@Zeaonrs wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:5, topic:515756”]looks like this is what u did:

Took trisidiax v3 changed the name and hosted it…Dont see anything new or interesting.[/quote]

Yes TrisidiaX v3 is the base but I fixed a lot of major bugs and have improved the eco.

Read full topic
